content:
#15052 and #15050 extend the monoid structure implied by docs#submodule.semiring to docs#sub_mul_action and docs#add_submonoid, which I was hoping to use in order to get some better induction principles for clifford_algebra/tensor_algebra/exterior_algebra.

Could someone take a look at these? There's not much of mathematical interest here unfortunately, but I'm expecting the machinery to be useful.
